name: TetriCar
description:
Game was created for Digital Night Jam 2. Topic was “DO IT YOURSELF” and that's the primary goal of TetriCar.
It's a game where the player is tasked with surviving as long as possible by creating their road with blocks (Remember Tetris?). You need to carefully place blocks but remember that the car always moves, so don't think too long.

Controls
A/D - used to turn car left/right
SPACE - is used to place down a block Left/Right arrow-used to move block left/right
ARROW UP/ARROW DOWN - Used to rotate block

Authors
Szymon Omieciński (@shy_037)

Adam Madej (@itsarahmitz)

Maciej Górski (@BigDinDonMan)

Jakub Kazimierski (@KubaKazmierski)
